actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2000.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2000 (as enacted by division B of Public Law 106-113) to repeal a per-State limitation applicable to certain grants made by the Chairperson of the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for FY 2000.

titles.title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2000.
